Html: When I press the "Clear All" button on "cache" tab, I receive the following message.  "Access to path 'System.Data.SqlLite.DLL' is denied."  I'm assuming this is some sort of permissions error.  How can I clear my cache?
it's cleared, but because it's ony demo app, all kind of messages are expected ;} don't worry

I'm not clear on this answer.  I created my own app.  I'm allowing the user to select an area and click save.  Once they click save, I clear the cache and the perform a prefetch.  Once the prefetch is complete, I perform an export.  The problem is, I cannot clear the cache because I receive the 'Access to path is denied'.  How can I clear the cache, so when I perform a prefetch then export, I'm only saving data the user wanted.
Works like a charm.  Thanks.  BTW, awesome control.
